Verses: 1 indha Nadapadikalukkup Pinbu, Egipthu Raajaavukkup Paanapaaththirakkaaranum Suyampaakiyum Egipthu Raajaavaagiya Thangal Aandavanukkuk Kutram Seydhaargal.
2  Paarvon Than Paanapaaththirakkaararin Thalaivanum Suyampaakigalin Thalaivanum Aagiya Ivvirandu Piradhaanigal Melum Katungopangondu,
3 avargalai Yoseppu Vaikkappattirundha Idamum Thalaiyaarigalin Adhipadhiyin Veedumaagiya Siraichchaalaiyile Kaavalpannuviththaan.
4  Thalaiyaarigalin Adhipadhi Avargalai Visaarikkumpadi Yoseppin Vasaththil Oppuviththaan; Avan Avargalai Visaariththuvandhaan; Avargal Aneganaal Kaavalil Irundhaargal.
5 egipthu Raajaavukkup Paanapaaththirakkaaranum Suyampaakiyumaagiya Avviranduperum Siraichchaalaiyil Irukkumpodhu, Ore Raaththiriyile Vevveru Porulkonda Soppanam Kandaargal.
6 kaalame Yoseppu Avargalidaththil Poi, Avargalaip Paarkkumpodhu, Avargal Kalangiyirundhaargal.
7 appozhudhu Avan Than Ejamaanudaiya Veettil Thannode Kaavalpannappattirundha Paarvonudaiya Piradhaanigalai Nokki: Ungal Mugangal Indru Thukkamaayirukkiradhu Enna Endru Kettaan.

8 adharku Avargal: Soppanam Kandom, Adharku Arththam Sollugiravan Oruvanum Illai Endraargal. Adharku Yoseppu: Soppanaththukku Arththam Solludhal Dhevanukkuriyadhallavaa? Avaigalai Ennidaththil Sollungal Endraan.
9 appozhudhu Paanapaaththirakkaararin Thalaivan Yoseppai Nokki: En Soppanaththile Oru Thiraatsaich Cheti Enakku Munbaaga Irukgak Kanten.
10 andhath Thiraatsach Chetiyile Moondru Kodikal Irundhadhu; Adhu Thulirkkiradhaayirundhadhu; Adhil Pookkal Malarndhirundhadhu; Adhin Kulaikal Pazhuththa Pazhangalaayirundhadhu.

11 paarvonudaiya Paaththiram En Kaiyile Irundhadhu; Naan Andhap Pazhangalaip Pariththu, Avaigalaip Paarvonudaiya Paaththiraththil Pizhindhu, Andhap Paaththiraththaip Paarvonudaiya Kaiyile Koduththen Endru, Than Soppanaththaich Chonnaan.
12  Adharku Yoseppu: Andha Moondru Kodikalum Moondru Naalaam.

13 moondru Naalaikkulle Paarvon Un Thalaiyai Uyarththi, Unnai Marupadiyum Un Nilaiyile Niruththuvaar; Munne Avarukkup Paanam Koduththuvandha Vazhakgaththinpadi Paarvonin Paaththiraththai Avar Kaiyile Koduppaai;

14 idhudhaan Adhin Arththam Endru Sonnadhum Andri, Nee Vaazhvataindhirukkumpodhu, Ennai Ninaiththu, Enmel Dhayavuvaiththu, En Kaariyaththaip Paarvonukku Ariviththu, Indha Itaththilirundhu Ennai Vitudhalaiyaakgaventum.
15 naan Epireyarudaiya Dhesaththilirundhu Kalavaaik Konduvarappatten; Ennai Indhak Gaaval Kitangil Vaikkumpadikkum Naan Ivvitaththil Ondrum Seyyavillai Endrum Sonnaan.
16  Arththam Nandraayirukkiradhu Endru Suyampaakikalin Thalaivan Kandu, Yoseppai Nokki: Naanum En Soppanaththil Moondru Vellaik Koodaikal En Thalaiyinmel Irukgak Kanten;
17  Merkoodaiyile Paarvonukgaagach Chamaikgappatta Sakalavidha Palakaarangalilum Konjam Konjam Irundhadhu; En Thalaiyinmel Koodaiyil Irundhavaigalaip Paravaigal Vandhu Patchiththadhu Endraan.
18  Adharku Yoseppu: Andha Moondru Koodaikalum Moondru Naalaam.
19  Innum Moondru Naalaikkulle Paarvon Un Thalaiyai Uyarththi, Unnai Maraththile Thookkippotuvaar; Appozhudhu Paravaigal Un Maamsaththaith Thinnum, Idhudhaan Adhin Arththam Endru Sonnaan.

20 moondraamnaal Paarvonudaiya Janma Naalaayirundhadhu; Avan Than Oozhiyakkaarar Ellaarukkum Virundhupanni, Paanapaaththirakkaararudaiya Thalaivan Thalaiyaiyum Suyampaakikaludaiya Thalaivan Thalaiyaiyum Than Uththiyogasdharin Natuve Uyarththi,
21 paanapaaththirakkaararin Thalaivanaip Paanangotukkira Than Uththiyogaththile Marupadiyum Vaiththaan; Andhappadiye Avan Paarvonudaiya Kaiyile Paaththiraththaik Koduththaan.
22 suyampaakikalin Thalaivanaiyo Thookkippottaan. Yoseppu Avargalukkuch Chonna Arththaththinpadiye Sampaviththadhu.
23 aanaalum Paanapaaththirakkaararin Thalaivan Yoseppai Ninaiyaamal Avanai Marandhuvittaan.
